name: FoodQuestions
0:
”Alexa, open food questions”
”Alexa, launch food questions”
”Alexa, start food questions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: food questions
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Food Questions" is an Alexa skill designed to test your general knowledge of the food world.
Users are asked general questions about foods around the world and must answer with a "yes" or "no". 

Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.

The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.

In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.

Try the multiplayer mode, challenge your friends and family and find out who will be the winner!

Enjoy!
